data.title: Agency Business Report 2024: APCO
data.meta_description: Agency Business Report 2024: APCO. From PR Week
data.text:
The recently rebranded firm had solid organic growth and climbed over $200 million in annual revenue thanks to acquisitions.

by PRWeek staff
